Share passion for staying on top of tech trends, experimenting with new technologies, participating in internal & external technology communities, mentoring other members of the engineering community

Utilize programming languages like JavaScript, Java, HTML/CSS, TypeScript, SQL, Python, Go, Open Source RDBMS and NoSQL databases, Container Orchestration services including Docker and Kubernetes, and a variety of AWS tools and services
